properties.areaDesc: Pickens, AL; Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 7:50PM CST until January 14 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale...
Marengo...Pickens and Sumter Counties.

.Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is expected across the Tombigbee River
Basin over the next 48 hours. This will likely cause rises once
again on the River, and a Flood Warning is now in effect for the
Tombigbee River at Bevill Lock and Dam.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam.
* from Sunday afternoon to Tuesday evening...or until the Warning is
cancelled.
* At  6:00 PM Friday The stage Was 111.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 122.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Sunday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 123.0 feet by early Monday afternoon. The river
will fall below flood stage by Tuesday morning.
* Impact...At 122.0 feet...Cattle in low-lying areas of Southern
Pickens County should be moved to higher ground. Cattle are cutoff
in lowlands of Southern Pickens County at stages above 122 feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
